title: Did a Banned Federal Study Show That Refugees Bring in More in Government Revenues Than They Cost?
subtitle: A U.S. Department of Health and Human Services study compared the tax revenues generated by refugees to the overall cost of resettlement.
author: David Emery
vclaim: A leaked federal study showing that refugees to America brought in $63 billion more in government revenues than they cost in the last 10 years was "banned" by the Trump administration.
